_header: I thank Thee Lord that Thou me wrought / And with strong…
_description: A prayer of thanksgiving for the Redemption, at the end of (4083) — forty-eight lines in couplets

OxfQueens207.First Lines:
I thonke the lorde þat thow me wrouȝtAnd with stronge
                    paynys that thow me bou[ ]…
OxfQueens207.Last Lines:
…Thi body was hongyd to a treWhat may I say thow hast do for
                    meWith scorges [ ]
OxfQueens207.Note: Ends imperfectly because the folio is damaged.

CULIi643.First Lines:
i þanke þe lorde þat þu me wroȝteAnd with
                    stronge peynes þu me boȝte…
CULIi643.Last Lines:
…þis graunte me lorde y praye to þeffor marye loue
                    þy modyr free Amen

I Thanke the lord that thow me wroughtAnd with stronge peynes
                    þow me bought…

                    free Amen

BlairsColl13.First Lines:

                    strong painis þu me bout…
BlairsColl13.Last Lines:
…Wher þoru þat in maner dampnid beDerworþe lord
                    for þi pite Amen
